keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support 2.1 million apprenticeships since 2010, with a focus on giving young people the opportunity to succeed.

issues.education: All young people should have the opportunity to get on in life, and apprenticeships are a great way to achieve that.

contactInformation.address: Printed by Swan Print, Shuttleworth Road, Bedford, MK41 0EP. Published and promoted by C McHugh on behalf of Peter Morris (Lib Dem), all at 37 Kathie Road, Bedford, MK42 0QJ

quotes.text: The Liberal Democrats have helped 2.1 million apprentices start training since 2010. That's the biggest expansion in apprentices since the 1950s. North East Bedfordshire has seen 3,120 apprenticeship starts since 2010.

images.caption: PETER MORRIS with constituents in front of the Jobs Hub.
